law.catch_line: Manufacture And Sale Of Childrenâ€™S Clothing And Sleepwear; Rules And Regulations
law.text: The board shall make rules and regulations relating to the manufacture and sale of sleepwear and clothing for children up to and including size fourteen, which rules and regulations may specifically prohibit the sale or manufacture of any such clothing or sleepwear which it deems to be a fire hazard.
